import React from "react"; import "./id-component.css" export default class IdComponent extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { name : this.props.name, address : this.props.address, Dob : this.props.dob, email : this.props.email, cellNumber : this.props.cellNumber, showEditdob : false, showEditAddres : false, showEditemail : false, showEditCellNumber : false, } this.props.edit=this.props.edit.bind(this); this.saveData=this.saveData.bind(this); } saveData=(dat)=>{ this.props.edit(dat , this.props.index); } render(){ return(
